Title: Primal Desires: Battle of Trost District, Part 9
Director: Tetsuro Araki, Masashi Koizuka, Hiroyuki Tanaka
Actors: Yuki Kaji, Yui Ishikawa, Marina Inoue, Daisuke Ono
Plot: Jean manages to get another Maneuver Gear from a dead soldier and escape thanks to Annie, Connie, and Marco distracting the Titans. With Titan Eren now carrying the boulder towards the gate...
